analysis.description:
SirinVestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)

SirinVestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
SirinVestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#661-679) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0

Reentrancy in SirinVestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalVesting.add(_value) <= token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#577-578)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- grants (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#579-586)
	- totalVesting (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#589-590)
index in SirinCrowdsale.deleteGrantee (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#1239) is a local variable never initialiazed

SirinVestingTrustee.revoke (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#596-608) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,refund) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#605-608)

SirinVestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#661-679) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,transferable) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#677)

RefundVault.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#830-852) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,tokensToClaim) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#849)

RefundVault.claimAllInvestorTokensByOwner (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#864-875) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,depositedTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#872-874)

SirinVestingTrustee.revoke.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#598) shadows:
	- SirinVestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592)

SirinVestingTrustee.vestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#616-617) shadows:
	- SirinVestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592)

SirinVestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#663) shadows:
	- SirinVestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#557-592)

SirinCrowdsale.finalization has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.issue(presaleGranteesMapKeys[i],presaleGranteesMap[presaleGranteesMapKeys[i]]) (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#1152-1155)

SirinSmartToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#499)
SirinSmartToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x159e4500567b160fd3eca934387a62eca20caa24.sol#499-500)
